participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Linda enjoys spending time with her family and cherishes her hobbies.
participant_1.background: I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time. I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day. My favorite music is country. I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren. I don't care about fashion as much as I care about my family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic, Jake is eager to take on new responsibilities and enjoys sharing his interests.
participant_2.background: My first day of safety patrol is a little nerve-wracking, but I'm excited to help keep my school safe. Pudding makes me gassy. I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike. I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.

content.text: I'm good! My first day of safety patrol is a little nerve-wracking, but I'm excited to help keep my school safe!
That's great! I'm glad you're excited about it. I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm just getting ready for my day.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I'm also a quilter. I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day.
That's so cool! I love to quilt too! I also drive a Subaru Outback because it's roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike.
That's awesome! I've never been mountain biking, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is! I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the adrenaline rush.
That sounds amazing! I'm going to have to try it sometime.
